review: I love this! Some of the best money I have spent has been on my two daughter's Kindles, my Amazon Prime account...and now the Amazon Fire TV. I enjoy how they all interact. Our satellite tv went out last weekend, but we were still able to enjoy some family tv time (with family shows) because of this product. I'm very satisfied.
author: Amazon Customer

review: It is a nice piece of hardware to stream video that can also do video games. I own an Apple TV and an XBOX. As I am not a big gamer, I did not appreciate the added value from the Amazon Fire. If you don't care about the Apple ecosystem and you don't have any other streaming device the Amazon fire is a very decent piece of hardware.
